segments.text: Have we sold out all the newspapers for today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . What a good job we have done !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why are so many extra gifts left here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about giving them to that old man ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: By the way , do you think it's a good idea to give free gifts to attract customers ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not sure , but still it did attract a large crowds today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think it should be more useful to hand out some fliers which is also cheaper .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But people can just throw them into the trash can as they turn around .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Anyway , let's just finish out job and get back home .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay . How tiring the job is !
segments.speaker: S1
